description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/timedelta.svg?maxage=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/timedelta/) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-unlicense-blue.svg?longcache=true)](https://unlicense.org/) ### installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install timedelta ``` #### examples ```python >>> import timedelta >>> td = timedelta.timedelta(days=2, hours=2) # init from datetime.timedelta >>> td = timedelta.timedelta(datetime1 - datetime2) ``` `total` seconds, minutes, hours, days ```python >>> td = timedelta.timedelta(days=2, hours=2) >>> td.total.seconds 180000 >>> td.total.minutes 3000 >>> td.total.hours 50 >>> td.total.days 2 ``` #### links + [timedelta objects](https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#timedelta-objects)

readme42.com
name: timedelta
